meanings.definition: A sandwich or roll filled with various ingredients.
meanings.sent1: For lunch, I enjoyed a delicious butty with ham and cheese.
meanings.sent2: I always look forward to having a butty for a quick and tasty meal.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, everyone fought over the last butty - it was that good!
meanings.sent4: The butty was a flavor explosion in my mouth, like a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The butty was so fresh and satisfying, it instantly became my favorite sandwich.

meanings.sent1: My best friend has been my butty since we were kids.
meanings.sent2: I can always count on my butty to cheer me up when I'm feeling down.
meanings.sent3: Even though we argue sometimes, my butty always has my back.
meanings.sent4: She's not just a friend, she's my butty - always there for me.
meanings.sent5: Having a loyal butty like him makes life so much better and brighter.

meanings.definition: To work as a partner or assistant.
meanings.sent1: We decided to butty up for the project to get it done faster.
meanings.sent2: When we butty together, we make a great team and accomplish a lot.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I'd butty with someone so organized - it's a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent4: Buttying with her was like dancing in perfect harmony, each step complementing the other.
meanings.sent5: The way we buttyed on the presentation impressed everyone with our teamwork skills.
